features.blockchainSecurityDesc: Every vaccination record is immutable and secured by advanced blockchain technology, ensuring data integrity and preventing fraud.
features.globalAccessibilityDesc: Access your vaccination history from anywhere in the world. Your digital passport is recognized globally.
features.instantVerificationDesc: Verifiers can instantly check the authenticity of your records without compromising your privacy.

hero.trustTitle:
Trust in Every Dose,
Secured by Blockchain.
hero.description: VaxSafe is the world's leading decentralized vaccination management platform. We bridge the gap between healthcare providers and patients with immutable, transparent, and secure records.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.heading: To create a transparent and secure future for global healthcare.
mission.description: We believe that health data belongs to the patient. By leveraging blockchain technology, we empower individuals to own, manage, and share their vaccination records securely, without intermediaries.

2023.title: 2023 - Inception
2023.desc: VaxSafe was founded with a vision to secure health records.

2024.title: 2024 - Beta Launch
2024.desc: Launched pilot program with 10 major vaccination centers.

2025.title: 2025 - Global Expansion
2025.desc: Reached 1 million users and expanded to 5 countries.

future.title: Future
future.desc: Integrating AI for predictive health analytics.

cta.title:
Ready to secure your health?
Start using VaxSafe today.
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust VaxSafe for their vaccination management. Secure, fast, and always accessible.
